testsuite.name: todolist.As a user, I want to use the TodoMVC app so that I can efficiently manage and organize my tasks

testcase.classname: todolist.As a user, I want to use the TodoMVC app so that I can efficiently manage and organize my tasks
testcase.name: Adding an item to an empty Todo list

failure.message: The Todo list is not empty.

testcase.failure: Failing step: Given the Todo list is empty ... failed in 0.004s Location: features/todolist.feature:3 Assertion Failed: The Todo list is not empty.
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Adding an item to an empty Todo list Given the Todo list is empty ... failed in 0.004s When I add a Todo item labeled "Buy Grocery" ... skipped in 0.000s Then the list displays the item "Buy Grocery" ... skipped in 0.000s And the summary shows "1 item left!" ... skipped in 0.000s And the filter is set to "All" with no filters "Completed" or "Active" applied ... skipped in 0.000s When I click on the cross symbol next to the Todo item ... skipped in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.classname: todolist.As a user, I want to use the TodoMVC app so that I can efficiently manage and organize my tasks
testcase.name: Empty list can have three items added

failure.message: The Todo list is not empty.

testcase.failure: Failing step: Given the Todo list is empty ... failed in 0.004s Location: features/todolist.feature:12 Assertion Failed: The Todo list is not empty.
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Empty list can have three items added Given the Todo list is empty ... failed in 0.004s When I add Todos for "Buy milk" & "Call a friend" & "Learn a new skill" ... skipped in 0.000s Then only those items are listed ... skipped in 0.000s And the summary shows "3 items left!" ... skipped in 0.000s And the filter is set to "All" with no filters "Completed" or "Active" applied ... skipped in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
